column1: Little Goat Diner////This was a mistake. I don't even like dark chocolate. The pile of 3 large pancakes had chunks of dark chocolate chips and malt balls
column2: which made it slightly crunchy. The pancakes were dry though
column3: but too sweet for me to want to add syrup. I will not add butter because that's just more dark chocolate that I already don't like. Maybe someone who loves dark chocolate would dislike it less than me. Â This was a mistake for us.
